question: What is the main advantage of the proposed deep learning model for precipitation nowcasting in the context of climate change?
answer: The proposed model leverages multi-source meteorological data and physics-based forecasts to deliver high-resolution predictions in both time and space, capturing complex spatio-temporal dynamics through temporal attention networks and is optimized using data quality maps and dynamic thresholds, outperforming existing operational physics-based and extrapolation-based models.
